biography: Joni, a formidable presence hailing from Hill Side Golf Club, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While he may come across as reserved, those who know him well can attest to his dry wit and unwavering determination on the course.

Having made one prior appearance at the Hector Trophée, Joni has secured one victory, solidifying his reputation as a fierce competitor in pair formats. Despite not having claimed the Victor Trophy, his contributions to his team have been invaluable.

Although Joni is considered retired from Hector Trophée events and is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his past accomplishments remain a testament to his skill and dedication. It is always possible that we will see Joni again should circumstances change.
